directions: Do the following statements agree with the information given in Reading Passage 1?
In boxes 1-5 on your answer sheet, write
text: Examples of ancient stepwells can be found all over the world.
Stepwells had a range of functions, in addition to those related to water collection.
The few existing stepwells in Delhi are more attractive than those found elsewhere.
It took workers many years to build the stone steps characteristic of stepwells.
It number of steps above the water level in a stepwell altered during the course of a year.
